name: Python Developer/Quantitative engineer
description:
We are looking for a Python Developer/Quantitative engineer into a rapidly growing highly talented IT team in the Commodities business.

Responsibilities:

  • Software development of eTrading Commodities projects and development of computing systems on the platform;
  • Quantitative research and algorithmic problem solving;
  • Collaborate with a globally distributed team of developers, business analysts, quality assurance and support professionals;
  • Take active part in evolving existing platform architecture and data flows and up/downstream integration.

Mandatory skills:

  • Python experience;
  • BSc/MSc in Maths or Physics or relevant.

Nice-to-Have skills:

  • Experience with exchanges connectivity and adapters;
  • Quant experience or degree in mathematics;
  • Solid understanding of application lifecycle and approaches for enterprise integration;
  • !Excellent interpersonal skills and fluent spoken English!;
  • Experience of dealing with business stakeholders on the client side;
  • Experience in working within a team distributed between onsite and offshore.

Conditions:

  • Official registration in accordance with the RF TR;
  • Competitive income level: salary + bonuses;
  • Extended VHI with dentistry;
  • Work in an international technical hub;
  • Remote work;
  • Training at the Corporate University and participation in external trainings.
